title: Amber Says What | Nana Kwame Adjei-Brenyah
description:
Amber Ruffin says "what" about various issues in pop culture. (This segment originally aired on December 5.)

Then, Seth talks to author Nana Kwame Adjei-Brenyah, who also takes a few more questions backstage just for this podcast.
